summary: A struggling artist is hired to forge paintings, causing him to cross paths with his ex-wife and her powerful new husband.
cast: Keith Carradine|Linda Fiorentino|Wallace Shawn|Geneviève Bujold|Geraldine Chaplin|Kevin J. O'Connor|John Lone|Charlélie Couture|Elsa Raven|Ali Giron|Gailard Sartain|Michael Wilson|Robert Gould|Antonia Dauphin|Véronique Bellegarde|Isabel Serra|David Stein|Hubert Loiselle|Meegan Lee Ochs|Brooke Smith|Marthe Turgeon|Pierre Chagnon|Éric Gaudry|Timothy Webber|Mance Edmond|Normand Brathwaite|Michael Rudder|Paul Buissonneau|Lenie Scoffié|Reynald Bouchard|Flora Balzano|Beverly Murray|Renée Lee|Charles Biddle Sr.|Glenn Bradley|Didier Hoffmann|Jean-Jacques Desjardins|Ada Fuoco|Harry Hill|Marcel Girard|Danielle Schneider|Stephanie Biddle|Louis Pharand|Daniel Bloch|Julien Carletti
title: Los modernos
